titles.title: A bill to authorize funding for the American Prosecutors Research Institute's National Center for Prosecution of Child Abuse and the American Prosecutors Research Institute's National Child Protection Training Center at Winona State University.

A bill to authorize funding for the American Prosecutors Research Institute's National Center for Prosecution of Child Abuse and the American Prosecutors Research Institute's National Child Protection Training Center at Winona State University.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Authorizes appropriations for grants under the Victims of Child Abuse Act of 1990 for technical assistance and training programs for FY 2006 through 2010 to the American Prosecutors Research Institute's National Center for Prosecution of Child Abuse and the Institute's National Child Protection Training Center at Winona State University.
